Package com.irurueta.ar.epipolar.estimators

Interface HomographyDecomposerListener

public interface HomographyDecomposerListener
Listener to be notified of events generated by an homography decomposer.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onDecomposeEnd(HomographyDecomposer decomposer, List<HomographyDecomposition> result)
    Called when decomposition ends.
    void
    onDecomposeStart(HomographyDecomposer decomposer)
    Called when decomposition starts.

    • onDecomposeEnd

      void onDecomposeEnd(HomographyDecomposer decomposer, List<HomographyDecomposition> result)
      Called when decomposition ends.
      Parameters:
      decomposer - an homography decomposer.
      result - estimated possible homography decompositions.
